associate().details: This function allows an account to opt-in to receive the token

returns.responseCode: The response code indicating the result of the operation

dissociate().details: This function allows an account to opt-out from receiving the token

returns.responseCode: The response code indicating the result of the operation

isAssociated().details: This function returns the association status of the calling account

returns.associated: True if the account is associated, false otherwise

associate().notice: Associates the calling account with the token

dissociate().notice: Dissociates the calling account from the token

isAssociated().notice: Checks if the calling account is associated with the token
